title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin is tired of people making excuses for Dak Prescott and makes an interesting comparison to another NFL quarterback everyone criticizes. He explains why "being cool" doesn't mean anything in the NFL after a survey produces interesting results about the most likeable players in the league. He also defends Aaron Rodgers for something he hasn't had that Tom Brady gets at this point in his career. Plus, Fox Sports college football analyst Joel Klatt joins the show to proclaim Georgia as the new standard across the country and why Texas is better than you think. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
